- only if PI.DISCOUNTALLOWED <> 0 or PI.DISCOUNTNOTALLOWED <> 0
- see T.P. of current task

- with ADML_LTYP_TYPE = 1-9 or 13 or 15 (13 is new)

only one handled invoice has to be displayed in the first part of the screen
the input parameters will be displayed in this case
2. If debtor heller or debtor client numer was entered auto. insert of the field
which is empty

03.02.2003 SCR2751 SH Skip test if CLIENT exists if TPID_LEDGER_NO >0

- back from ADML, with TINP_ADMNO / TINP_LEDFER_NUMBER

09.10.2002 SH Changed list of arguments for BPH113 according to new SPECS
02.10.2002 SCR2280 SH If entered paymentcode = v.GNRL_PAYMCODTRANSFERCOSTS
- give errormessage
10.09.2002 SCR2130 SH If entered paymentcode = v.GNRL_PAYMCODEEXCHGDIFFERENCE
- give errormessage
04.09.2002 SCR2096 SH Add new field TPID_INVOICENO which will be stored
- into BPIV
20.08.2002 SH Use the DATE() instead of BTCH_DATE as argument for GB002
14.08.2002 SCR1946 SH ADMNO/CNLNT/DEBC/DEBH are mandatory fields now,
- otherwise it was possible to store differences in BPIV without this fields and
- than we got problems with BXA programs.
13.08.2002 SH If OPH202B6 was called from OPH202B the check if already
- discounts were booked wil be made now on BPIV_DEBC_NO niveau, because it's
- possible to book discounts as differences for different accounts
07.08.2002 SH Add new function "Search Debtor" to change the debtor for booking
- differences
1. Different changes according to changes OPH202C
1. New function --> Delete bookings, add new button to delete all bookings for
the current debtor
2. Only if the sum of discount and not allowed discount = PI.Difference *-1
including the roundingdifference, we initialize the temp table with the
differences for discounts, otherwise with the PI.Difference *-1
30.07.2002 SH (The hole FORM changed, see details)
1. Show tabular view of already booked invoices and differences
2. Replaced checkbox TINP_LETTER by TINP_CODEALPHA to enter directly
the standardtext
3. Add new button to open screen to enter variable text for the actual differenc
4. Add new parameters to show debtor fields and total amounts from OPH202B
1. Add new parameter "PO.REMAINIG DIFFERENCE", if 0 then the payment
- can close directly
2. Park cursor on field "Paymentcode" if OPH202B6 started
3. Add field "TPDI_CODE_A_STANDARDEXT" on screen to enter the code for the
- standardtext and dispaly the code description if a code was entered
4. Amount could be entered without decimals now, used UFB547 to map the amount
from alpha to numeric
04.07.2002 SH SCR1508 New parameters PI.SUM_ALLOWEDDISCOUNT,
- PI.SUM_NOTALLOWEDDISCOUNT and PI.DIFFERNCE, need to initialize
- fields v.PAYMENT_CODE, v.AMOUNT, also new lines were added at the buttom of
- the screen, PAYMENTDIFFERENCE and REMAINING DIFFERENCE
13.03.2002 SH SCR964 (Add new field TPDI_LETTER, if checked it's mandatory
-- to select a standard text)
SCR#50 --> OK

entered TPID row where TPID_AMOUNT <> 0

-- Exit programm

in CREATE MODE to show empty table

differences with the discounts

variable text

changed, see also handler "b.Client Info"
-- Stored control on which the cursors last parked

- Check if there are also invoices in the delcredere administration -> info user

to select a client where client currency <> currency of previous selected
client --> test is only performed in case of BTCH_BTCHCODE = cheques
-- KBGET (1)='Exit'ACT AND W='' OR KBGET (0)='Esc'KBD
-- directly over the menue out of this program, the following BLOCK

-- Errors found

-- Delete related invoice note

- store on which control the cursor last parked, need to jump back to
- control field "AMOUNT" if R.S. was executed
-- Perform a ScreenRefresh, uses to show new calc totals at the bottom of screen
(A screenrefresh has not to be executed, if the user changed the amount, did
not leave the field "Amount" and wanted to create a new record. Otherwise
MAGIC loose the handle of the actual modified record and give the message:
"Record no longer in view" and positioned the cursor on the first line)
-- update again with 316 to perform a recompute for LinkQuery on CREM, to
becomes the red retangle for button "Client info" red, if client info was
entered
-- see remark in R.S.
-- If v.TEXT_1 empty update with TPDI_TEXT of the current row and with
TPDI_TEXT of the next two TPDI rows, where TPDI_AMOUNT = 0
@ The users enters sometimes additional rows to TPDI, because TPDI_TEXT is only
A25 and they need more space for text. In this case TPDI_AMOUNT = 0.
It's necessary that the users position the cursor on the TPDI row where they
entered the TPDI_AMOUNT, before they press button "Variable letters",
otherwise the following task is not able to select the TPDI rows with
the additional text, max. 3 TPDI_TEXT strings will be wwritten to v.TEXT_1
-- KBGET (1)='Exit'ACT
-- directly over the menue out of this program, the following BLOCK
-- will be executed --> -- Ask USER for confirmation if he changed
-- data
-- Button OK = 'O'
-- Button Cancel ='C'
-- no check and save entries
-- Check and save entries
-- INFO: If OPH202B6 was called from OPH202D we do not dispaly the already
booked invoices/differences from table TINP, therefore we used a cndrange
to field TINP_RUNNINGNUMBER with 999999999, so the task
displays the Input parameters from OPH202D
--> TINP_RUNNINGNUMMER = 999999999 is a dummy record
--> see Range expression
-- Button OK = 'O'
-- Button Cancel ='C'
-- Check and save entries
-- no check and save entries

ExpSyntax.val: {1,4}<>{4,3} AND VarMod ('{4,3}'VAR) OR {1,5}<>{4,4} AND VarMod ('{4,4}'VAR) OR {1,6}<>{4,10} AND VarMod ('{4,10}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,11}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,21}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,22}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,26}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,15}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,28}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,29}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,20}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,30}'VAR)

Text.val: -- Check ADMNO

-- Client status does not allow payment handling (= END staus)
-- Client not allowed for this currency
-- Not allowed to change the administration number of the draft
... INFO- Payment for unknown invoices, must be booked at another administration
-- Check DEBC_DEBC
-- User has no write permission to select legal collection debtor for payment
handling
-- Check PAYMENTCODE, optional if TPID_AMOUNT=0 AND TPID_TEXT<>blank
-- Paymentcode = v.GNRL_PAYMCODEEXCHGDIFFERENCE, not allowed
-- Paymentcode = GNRL_PAYMCODTRANSFERCOSTS , not allowed
-- Check LEDGERNUMBER

-- 2. Test -->The entered Ledger number is not allowed
-- Check client/debtor or ledger must exist
-- Only amounts > 0 are valid
-- Only amounts < 0 are valid
-- Check if it's allowed to enter an invoice number
-- Additional Validations

-- TPID_DEBH or TPID_DEBC must be entered in case of FCI
-- If TPDI_CODE_A_STANDARDEXT <> '' then the code has to be in table CODE
-- with Type = 202 and userlanguage
letter is mandatory for this payment code
-- According to client attributes 316 debtors cannot be approached / Continue
-- According to debtor attributes this debtor cannot be approached / Continue
... Create mode allowed, users positioned the cursor on the last TPID line
... Create mode not allowed, the users tries to create a new TPID row in the
middle of the TPID list (see also remark in parent task)
-- Get DEBC_NO, uses as argument for BPH113, maybe in the future table TPDI
-- will be enlarged with the DEBC_NO, then we never used this LINK
-- only if differences added by junior users and they entered a payment code
-- input parameters for BPH113
-- variables only used if differences added by junior users, see tests R.S.

where TPID_LEDGER_NUMBER > 0, then this additional text has to be
stored to BPIV by using the same BTPC_LINENO as the ledger row
-- Store Line in BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE (BPH113)
... first prepare some input parameters
-- PI.INVU_ID
... in case of legal collection interest / costs
-- PI.LEDG_NO
... legal costs
... legal interest
-- If junior users handles payment differences, in some cases BPIV_CHECKCODE has
to be updated, which means senior users have to approve the bookings before
starting BPH250 (= final bookings)
... recal booked difference from payment currency to heller currency
-- 1. Payment diff > amount received
-- 2. Daily rate > 5% difference
-- 3. Payment code (if both tests, see below, have to be performed, both have to
be TRUE)
... check if above precentages
... check if above amount
set variable = FALSE, because if both tests have to be performed, both have
to be TRUE
-- Store additional values to BPIV
-- Store BPIV_BTPC_LINENO and BPIV_LINENO to TEMP_258, calc by BPH113
